price: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Kada ku jiɓinci waɗansu mutãne* da Allah Ya yi hushi a kansu. Lalle sun yanke tsammãni daga (rahamar) Lãhira, kamar yadda kãfirai suka yanke tsammãni daga mazõwa** kaburbura.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ قَوۡمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَدۡ يَئِسُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ كَمَا يَئِسَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡقُبُورِ
category: She that is to be Examined
footnotes: * Allah Ya yi Fushi ga duk wanda ya sani kuma ya ƙi aiki da saninsa kamar Yahũdãwa da miyãgun Mãlamai. ** Kãfirai ba su yarda da Tãshin Ƙiyãma ba, sabõda haka suke yanke ƙauna daga wanda ya mutu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
